attributes.action: Funding for disaffected people to leave the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Many thousands of people who have moved to the United Kingdom, and many British-born people, are vocal in their dislike, even hatred, of our way of life, our traditions and institutions. Their animosity often has religious and political origins.

We want the government to pass legislation that makes funds and resources available for disaffected people to permanently leave the UK.

The funding and resources should be actively marketed at Jobcentres, through Local Authorities and the media.
